# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe is worth every penny of its $8,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to make your decision soon. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
